page.title: 07ARTS AND ENTERTAINMENT 1
page.content: The group toured the survey area looking for places of Entertainments and places or objects of art. We started in Albert Park were there is a boating lake, playground, skating rink, an area for display, tennis courts, bowling greens, and playing fields, as well as a statue of W.F. Bolcow one of the towns founders, a sundial and a victorion clock. Outside Albert park there is Dorman Museum, with its domed copper roof. It is the areas main museum. on our way down Linthorpe road, the towns main shopping area, we visited the forbes building, an old bakery which recently been converted into an indoor shopping centre. Also on Linthorpe Road were some Modern Entertainments.
